text: Asylum is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on September 16, 1985. == Track listing == * King Of The Mountain * Any Way You Slice It * Who Wants To Be Lonely * Trial By Fire * I'm Alive * Love's A Deadly Weapon * Tears Are Falling * Secretly Cruel * Radar For Love * Uh! All Night Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1985 albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Asylum (album)
